SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MEMBER WHERE DEL_DT IS NULL
AND AUTHORITY_NO = #{cate}
AND AUTHORITY_NO IN (2, 3)
AND MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND NM LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
SELECT AUTHORITY_NO, AUTHORITY_NM FROM AUTHORITY WHERE AUTHORITY_NO IN (2, 3)
SELECT SMALL_CATEGORY, CODE_NM FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE LARGE_CATEGORY = 2

SELECT MEMBER_NO, AUTHORITY_NO, AUTHORITY_NM, NM, PWD, EMAIL, PHONE_NO, TO_CHAR(DATE_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DATE_BIRTH, SMALL_CATEGORY, CODE_NM, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, DETAIL_ADDRESS, RELIABILITY, NVL(CNT, '0') AS CNT, RNK, IMG_FILE FROM (SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, A.AUTHORITY_NO, AUTHORITY_NM, NM, PWD, EMAIL, PHONE_NO, DATE_BIRTH, SMALL_CATEGORY, CODE_NM, IMG_FILE, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, RELIABILITY, CNT, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO ASC) AS RNK FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN AUTHORITY A ON M.AUTHORITY_NO = A.AUTHORITY_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON M.GENDER = C.SMALL_CATEGORY AND C.LARGE_CATEGORY = 2 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT, TARGET_REPORT_MEMBER_NO FROM REPORT GROUP BY TARGET_REPORT_MEMBER_NO) R ON R.TARGET_REPORT_MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.DEL_DT IS NULL AND A.AUTHORITY_NO IN (2, 3) ) AM WHERE RNK BETWEEN 1 AND 10 AND MEMBER_NO = #{no}
